# nameOrder(for:)

**Type Method**

Returns the display name order.

## Declaration

```swift
class func nameOrder(for contact: CNContact) -> CNContactDisplayNameOrder
```

## Parameters

- **contact**: The contact whose name is to be formatted.

## Return Value

The display order to use when combining the given name and family name components.

## Discussion

For more information about display name orders, see [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactDisplayNameOrder].

## Getting format information

- **delimiter(for:)**: Returns the delimiter to use between name components.
- **CNContactDisplayNameOrder**: The formatting orders for contact names component.
